item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 20 Sep 2022
item.description:
1. Sandmark Nightly Service now reports Instructions Retired along with Time
  2. Outreachy December 2022
  3. Unicode 15.0.0 update for Uucd, Uucp, Uunf and Uuseg
  4. OUPS meetup september 2022 (french only)
  5. strymonas v2: library for highest-performance stream processing
  6. OCaml Community Code of Conduct
  7. Use OCaml to interact with Neovim
  8. What will be required to transpile OCaml to Lua?
  9. OBazl Toolsuite - tools for building OCaml with Bazel
